allow: Bash(gh repo create purifyai --public --source=. --remote=origin --push --description "Smart disk cleaning tool powered by PyQt5 and AI")
Bash(cd /g/docker/diskclean && git add src/core/database.py src/core/database_migration.py 2>&1 && git status 2>&1)
Bash(cd /g/docker/diskclean && git add src/utils/progress_estimator.py tests/test_progress_estimator.py 2>&1 && git status 2>&1)
Bash(cd /g/docker/diskclean && git add src/core/ai_analyzer.py tests/test_ai_analyzer.py 2>&1 && git status 2>&1)
Bash(cd /g/docker/diskclean && git add src/core/rule_engine.py tests/test_rule_engine_enhanced.py 2>&1 && git status 2>&1)
Bash(cd /g/docker/diskclean && git add src/core/backup_manager.py tests/test_backup_manager.py 2>&1 && git status 2>&1)
